response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $12,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $15,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your team. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
